plot: Along with becoming sober, a man cannot remember anything as if he had been to another world. His wife is mentally and physically tormented. One midsummer night, she gets the chance to kill her husband.
title: Sook-ja-ya
plot_es: Along with becoming sober, a man cannot remember anything as if he had been to another world. His wife is mentally and physically tormented. One midsummer night, she gets the chance to kill her husband.
plot_en: Along with becoming sober, a man cannot remember anything as if he had been to another world. His wife is mentally and physically tormented. One midsummer night, she gets the chance to kill her husband.
